metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Race condition in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.366 and 19.x through22.x before 22.0.0.209 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.632 on Linuxallows attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1').
